amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to be used by the Department of Homeland Security to lease or purchase new light duty vehicles, for any excutive fleet , or for an agency's fleet inventory, except in accordance with Presidential Memorandum-Federal Fleet Performance, dated May 24, 2011.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used by the Department of Homeland Security to lease or purchase new light duty vehicles, for any excutive fleet , or for an agency's fleet inventory, except in accordance with Presidential Memorandum-Federal Fleet Performance, dated May 24, 2011.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Engel amendment (A041) Agreed to by voice vote.
